title: Dinnerbone：可以让东西重新生成的调整器
author: REN0011
txt_content:
本帖最后由 REN0011 于 2015-7-21 19:13 编辑 

Dinnerbone(晚餐骨）:Back to working on the ender dragon today. Implementing a proper controller for the fight, so we can respawn everything as good as new.

今天继续把精力放在末影龙上。正在落实一个合适的调整器，那样的话我们就能重新生成任何东西。

https://twitter.com/dinnerbone/status/623432402422091776
